scripts.trivy:code: echo 'Scanning source code for vulnerabilities...' && docker-compose run --rm trivy --config trivy.yaml fs .
scripts.trivy:image: echo 'Scanning the Docker image for vulnerabilities...' && docker-compose run --rm trivy --config trivy.yaml image alex-can-boilerplate-prod
scripts.trivy:build-scan: echo 'Building Docker image and scanning image for vulnerabilities...' && npm run docker:build && npm run trivy:image
scripts.trivy:vuln: echo 'Scanning for vulnerabilities...' && docker-compose run --rm trivy --config trivy.yaml fs . --scanners vuln
scripts.validate: npm run knip:prod && npm run dep-cruise:check && npm run check:types && npm run lint:check
